channel.title: 317 | npc | need banker help!
channel.description:
hey guys, i just need a little help here my banker is looking to the right.. how to i make him look at the bank booth? here is some images... [IMG]http://i1097.photobucket.com/albums/g349/xRuneCraftxD/banker.jpg[/img] thats the banker.. i want him to look at the booth and this is the code - NOTEPAD - AUTO SPAWN
[IMG]http://i1097.photobucket.com/albums/g349/xRuneCraftxD/code.jpg[/img]
hope u guys can help me... :L put the help in a comment please.

item.title: 317 | npc | need banker help!
item.dc:creator: @Fexis Fexis
item.description:
@Fexis wrote:

This snippets isn’t by me, but it could help out your problem.

[QUOTE]I know this was released already but the other one was dis-organized and missing variables. This version is much nicer I suggest you use it.

This MIGHT work on PI/Emulous but I didn’t make it for them so it might not work for them, sorry guys.

Step 1) Open NPCHandler.java

Step 2) Search for if (npcs[i].walkingType >= 0) {

Step 3) Now replace that whole if statement with this:

					if (npcs[i].walkingType >= 0) {
						switch(npcs[i].walkingType) {

						case 5:
							npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX-1, npcs[i].absY);
							break;

						case 4:
							npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX+1, npcs[i].absY);
							break;

						case 3:
							npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
							break;
						case 2:
							npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY+1);
							break;

						default:
							if (npcs[i].walkingType >= 0) {
								npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY); //makes it when npcs move they dont turn back to one direction
							}
							break;
						}
					}

How to use what you just added:
Step 1)Open your autospawn.cfg

Step 2)In a line of code, change the number I have made red to your desired face direction.

I suggest you put this line at the top of your autospawn.cfg as a reference:

BONUS! Bankers of main cities facing the right directions:
Edgeville)

spawn = 5912 3096 3489 0 5 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3096 3491 0 5 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3096 3492 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3098 3492 0 2 0 0 0 Banker
Falador)

spawn = 6200 2945 3366 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 2946 3366 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 2947 3366 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 2948 3366 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 2949 3366 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 3010 3353 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 3011 3353 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 3012 3353 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 3013 3353 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 3014 3353 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 6200 3015 3353 0 2 0 0 0 Banker
Varrock)

spawn = 5912 3187 3446 0 5 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3187 3444 0 5 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3187 3442 0 5 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3187 3440 0 5 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3187 3438 0 5 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3187 3436 0 5 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3256 3418 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3255 3418 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3254 3418 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3253 3418 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3252 3418 0 2 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 5912 3251 3418 0 2 0 0 0 Banker

Post any errors or problems you get below otherwise I can’t help you! If you use this atleast rep+!
[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
